message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its worth to you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. However, $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested, but I'd be willing to pay around $8,000 for it.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still looking to get a good value for my product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10,000. It's a fair price considering its worth to you.
